snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo plans to use his budget proposal this week to push for approval of new ethics laws and a public campaign financing system, officials said.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo, seeking to prod recalcitrant lawmakers to take action after rash of embarrassing corruption scandals in Albany, reportedly plans to use his budget proposal to push for approval of new ethics laws and public financing system for state political campaigns.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo plans to use his budget proposal this week to push for approval of new ethics laws and a public campaign financing system, officials said.

headline.main: Cuomo’s Budget Is Said to Include Ethics and Campaign Finance Reforms
headline.print_headline: Cuomo’s Budget Is Said to Include Ethics and Campaign Finance Reforms
